title: Rehman Chishti – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rehman Chishti, the Conservative MP for Gillingham and Rainham, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I backed Rishi Sunak before and I will back him again. He was right on the economy.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
